content: please note- this pattern is written in english american english in american crochet terms this pattern does not have a chart this royal lacy shawl is designed using the german shells or virus stitch and a v_stitch it is lovely in many different colors and has repeats to easily make it bigger this shawls finished size is 68 inches across straight edge by 35 inches from middle to tip again you can make this shawl bigger by just continuing with the repeats there is a gauge pattern included with this pattern for yarn and hook comparisons but size numbers may differ for each individual materials needed 970 yards of red heart super saver ombre or any worsted weight yarn used 2 skeins g 4 25 mm hook scissors level of difficulty intermediate* *if you know how to single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch chain and read basic crochet patterns you can do this this pattern has a few photos for referencing also i am always around for questions so feel free to message me here please make sure to read all of the pattern including special notes ****************** pattern is available for instant download ***************** once payment is confirmed you will receive a link to download the pattern immediately make certain your etsy email is up to date and accurate before purchasing if you can not find your pattern in your email please look to your purchases open the order and click the download link you may also need to refresh your purchase page if you ever have any questions please contact me through etsy conversation thank you ***************************************************************************** to view the download button in your purchases after payment you must be on a desk top you may sell the finished items you make pattern is copyright protected it should not be reproduced redistributed or displayed publicly in any way please give credits to jonna martinez and include a link in reference to my shop ****you may not sell or share this pattern **** please refer friends and family to this listing***** also check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucocwjk4rjiqafsf1lsuerna my instagram https //www instagram com/jonnasienamartinez/ this pattern has been tested by a team of crochet testers many thanks to my testers hard work thank you so much for choosing my pattern and shop i hope you enjoy making your new lovely victoria s german shells shawl
